author: leeastley
title: Cristiano Ronaldo to be sold by Real Madrid by 2019 with China the Euro 2016 winner’s most likely destination
text:
EFL Ron the move Cristiano Ronaldo to be sold by Real Madrid by 2019 with China the Euro 2016 winner’s most likely destination 
Spanish publication Don Balon are claiming Florentino Perez wants to flog the former Manchester United attacker before his contract runs out and make back some of the £80m he cost By LEE ASTLEY
